meanings.sent1: The small scratch on the table was nonsignificant.
meanings.sent2: The color of the pen was nonsignificant to the overall design.
meanings.sent3: The nonsignificant pebble thought it was the most crucial part of the mountain.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, each fish felt nonsignificant compared to the mighty whale.
meanings.sent5: The single raindrop felt nonsignificant in the storm, but together they caused a flood.

meanings.sent1: The nonsignificant details in the painting went unnoticed by most viewers.
meanings.sent2: Her nonsignificant comment was quickly forgotten in the conversation.
meanings.sent3: The nonsignificant leaf thought it was the star of the tree.
meanings.sent4: In the story of life, some chapters may seem nonsignificant until the end.
meanings.sent5: The nonsignificant pebble in the shoe caused the biggest discomfort during the hike.
